patterns: What equipment is required for remote work?
responses: A secure, up-to-date computer or laptop that meets our hardware and software requirements, depending on job requirements, a company-issued or personal mobile device may be necessary for accessing corporate applications or for communication.

patterns: What are the requirements for certification to be eligible for reimbursement?

patterns: What are the conditions for reimbursement?
responses: To be eligible for reimbursement: 1. The employee must pass the certification exam. 2. If the employee fails the exam, they may take a second attempt. In this case, the reimbursement will be for the maximum of the two exam fees (either the first attempt or the retake). 3. If the employee fails the exam a second time, there will be no reimbursement for any attempt.

patterns: When will the fees be reimbursed?

responses: If you fail the second attempt, there will be no reimbursement for any attempt.
